entry.title: My way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: Millowe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,075Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Buck‚Äôs life might not be what he imagined it to be while he grew up. But it doesn‚Äôt matter, because he has his beautiful baby girl and she means everything to him. But then someone from his past reemerges, and it stirs up feelings he‚Äôs tried to bury for years. ---- His dark hair is tussled around his head, sweaty from the helmet and probably a bit longer than it‚Äôs supposed to be, and his jaw is shadowed with stubble. In the fifteen years since Buck last saw him the boy he once knew has turned into a man, and Buck swallows to dampen his suddenly dry throat.‚ÄúEddie.‚Äù He whispers hoarsely and the man blinks, once, twice before he hesitantly leans forward, like he‚Äôs about to step closer.

entry.summary:
Author: BiMyself_N_PANicking

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,654Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: She turns the book to a different page, now showing an old photo of our main characters, with the names; Eddie, Buck and Ravi. We zoom in to the photo of the three kids on the docks outside their small town. Two boys raising their swords and the last boy raising his guitar. ‚ÄúNo retreat. No Surrender!‚Äù The three boys chanted, running back toward the town entrance; running through the city, straight to the church's cemetery. ¬† A Book Of Life rewritten as a Buddie AU. With Eddie as Manolo, Buck as Maria, and Ravi as Joaquin.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,106Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 50

No Trespassing Allowed,‚Äù Chris reads the two homemade signs stuck on their front door as Eddie notices two Santa hats with green trims and patches sitting on a chair with a note - ‚ÄòPut these on to enter.‚Äô ‚ÄúI think we are about to find out what Buck was actually doing today,‚Äù Eddie says as he puts one hat on Chris and fixes the other one on his own head and they enter the house. After an argument with his parents around Christmas plans, Eddie and Chris are feeling kinda Grinchy towards Christmas this year, considering everything that has been happening. entry.title: The Weather Outside Is Frightful
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,330Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 40

Summary: Athena plans a Christmas getaway to celebrate Bobby‚Äôs return, but a booking mix-up leaves Buck and Eddie sharing a two-bedroom cabin‚Ä¶ alone. The rest of the 118 ends up in the bigger cabin (and immediately continues there betting pool), while Chris quietly joins Team ‚ÄúMy Dad and Buck Need to Get Together Before Christmas.‚Äù What follows is a week of accidental couple‚Äôs activities, mistletoe mishaps, disastrous gingerbread houses, Buck teaching Eddie how to ski, snowball fights, and so many almost-moments neither of them will admit to. Buck‚Äôs convinced Eddie‚Äôs straight. Eddie‚Äôs convinced Buck could never want him back.And on Christmas Eve, when a storm traps them in their cabin, they finally have no choice but to talk about everything they‚Äôve been avoiding. A holiday trip, a slow burn, and two idiots in love trying very hard not to be. Or Buck and Eddie get stuck sharing a cabin during the 118‚Äôs Christmas vacation, and every holiday trope in existence decides to attack them at once.By Christmas Eve, the only thing more intense than the snowstorm is the truth they‚Äôve been avoiding.

entry.title: merry christmas, evan buckley!
entry.summary:
Author: katasstropheee

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,121Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: ‚ÄúHey,‚Äù Eddie said, lowering his voice and bringing a hand up to Buck‚Äôs face. With a nudge to his chin, Buck had little choice but to turn his head, meeting Eddie‚Äôs direct and serene gaze. ‚ÄúDo you trust me?‚Äù Buck was startled by the question. ‚ÄúWith my life,‚Äù he answered without hesitation. For a second, a small smile appeared on Eddie‚Äôs face, a shy smile which he quickly masked. His gaze still held the same placidity as he said, ‚ÄúThen trust me now. As soon as you are meant to know anything, I will tell you.‚Äù ‚ÄúPromise?‚Äù OR an exercise in patience, trust, and secret recipes.

entry.title: War of Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Sunset_Swerve_76

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,908Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Kendall Bennet was facing an existential crisis and moved to Los Angeles like every other girl her age. While there, she stumbles upon her estranged Uncle Bobby Nash. He encourages her to become a paramedic, and when she ends up at his firehouse, she not only meets a newfound family but also two men who will change her life forever. Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz will save her and be the death of her at the same time. She could never love two men more than she does her idiot firefighter boyfriends.

Summary: Eddie looks to the side and makes eye contact with another boy further up the aisle. He's tall, taller than him, and thin, all gangly limbs. His hair is short and curly, rocking a grown-out, faded orange color. His jeans are loose and ripped, and he's got a short-sleeved button-down with the sleeves rolled up even more to show off his pale arms. He's got a mark above and below his eyebrow, tinted the same shade of pink as his lips. He's attractive and has pretty blue eyes, and Eddie blushes when he realizes he's been staring. entry.title: You Either Die A Hero
entry.summary:
Author: ThisIsGayAF69

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,140Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Evan Buckley (24) fell through the cracks, desperate for money to fund his sister's medical needs. Becoming a criminal was the only way. What happens when the local Vigilante and thought-to-be-Urban-Legend starts regularly messing up Buck's jobs and getting him into trouble? Edmundo Diaz (24) has spent almost a decade of his life searching for the man that broke his family and left him for dead. Becoming a Vigilante was the only way. What happens when the local, cocky, superpowered asshole keeps getting in his way? (All the regular 9-1-1 cast will make an appearance and be relevant in time)

entry.title: let 'em burn
entry.summary:
Author: sinnabonka

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,884Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 152

Summary: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know what you want from me anymore,‚Äù Eddie says through the door, his voice worn thin at the edges. There‚Äôs a soft thud against the wood, and Buck doesn‚Äôt need to see it to know ‚Äì Eddie‚Äôs forehead resting there. ‚ÄúTalk to me.‚Äù ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs nothing to say,‚Äù Buck replies. The words come out flat. He closes his eyes, trying to shut down at least one sense. ‚ÄúHow about when you said you don‚Äôt need me?‚Äù Buck exhales, slow and heavy. Because that‚Äôs it. The lie he wants to believe because believing it would make everything hurt less. The one that keeps failing him ‚Äì failed him today, almost got him killed, almost pulled him down into the pit because for one terrifying moment he was sure Eddie was gone.One bad call, one broken dam, and suddenly Buck and Eddie aren't pretending anymore.

We- I think we said two beds.‚Äù Buck knows he‚Äôs blushing already. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs two of us,‚Äù he adds unnecessarily.
